plugin.label: lookaheadLimiter
plugin.name: Lookahead limiter

port.label: limit
port.name: Limit (dB)
port.p: The maximum output amplitude. Peaks over this level will be attenuated as smoothly as possible to bring them as close as possible to this level.

port.label: delay_s
port.name: Lookahead delay
port.p: The delay used by the lookahead predictor. The longer the delay the smoother the limiting will be, but higher the latency.

port.label: attenuation
port.name: Attenuation (dB)
port.p: The current attenuation of the signal coming out of the delay buffer.
